articles.author: Robert Lea
articles.title: The mystery of vast 'cosmic ORCs' — odd radio circles that encompass entire galaxies — may be solved - Space.com
articles.description: Astronomers have pointed to winds from bursts of supernova star explosions as the cause of huge and eerie "odd radio circles."
